title: DBER.xyz
text:
This is a knowledge management project by Jeff Raker.
The goal is to curate resources, information, experiences for an individual to move from educator to education researcher. Whether new to education research, a seasoned researcher, or research trainee mentor, the content of DBER.xyz includes something for you.
Content is provided for informational and educational purposes. Collaboration with an educational research expert, participation in formal education research studies and communities of practice, and similar experiences are ideal to developing the knowledge and skills of a education researcher.
While the URL may suggest a broad focus (i.e., all discipline-based education research), at the moment, the website is developed by a chemical education scholar and thus is primarily focused on chemical education scholarship.

title: DBER.xyz
text:

D. Scholarly Activities

Institutional Review Boards - Data Collection - Data Analysis - Reference Management - Research Proposals (Dissertation, Grant)



E. Professional Practice

Knowledge Management - Writing - Content Creation - Notebook or Journal or Diary

title: Terms of Use
text:

You agree to use DBER.xyz, its materials, information, and services only for purposes that are permitted by these Terms of Use.
You may use the materials, information, and services for legal purposes only. title: Terms of Use
text:

title: Author Team
text:
Dr. Raker is a faculty member at the University of South Florida with expertise in chemical education, discipline-based education research.
They have authored and collaborated on 65+ peer-reviewed publications (Google Scholar).

title: Terms of Use
text:
Copyright Infringement
If you beleive that your work has been used or copied in a way on DBER.xyz that constitutes copyright infringement, please notify the DBER.xyz authorship team and its agents in writing as required by the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. For the DBER.xyz authorship team and its agents to act on your notice, you must be authorized to enforce the copyrights that you allege have been infringed. When informing DBER.xyz of an alleged infringement: - Indentify the copyrighted work that allegedly has been infringed. If multiple copyrighted works at a single online stie are involved, please provide a representation list of such works on the site. - Describe the material that is claimed to be infringing and provide sufficient information to permit the DBER.xyz authorship team or their agents to locate the material. - Provide your contact information including an email address, telephone number, and mailing address. - Certify or include a statement that you have a good faith belief that the use of the copyright-protected mateiral in the manner complained of is not authorized by the the copyright owner, the owner’s agent, or law. - Certify that the information that you have provided the DBER.xyz authorship team is accurate. Attest under penalty of perjufry that you are authorized to enforce the copyrights that you allege have been infringed. - Include your physical or electronic signature.

title: Terms of Use
text:
Privacy Policy
When you access and use DBER.xyz, information may be collected indirectly and automatically (through, for example, the use of IP addresses) about your activities while visiting and interacting with the site, including the pages you view, the number of times you view them, the length of your visit, files downloaded, and information about the browser you are using. An IP address is a number that is automatically assigned to your computer when you use the Internet. In some cases, your IP address stats the same from browser session to browser session; but, if you use a consumer internet access provider, your IP address likely varies from session to session. DBER.xyz does not link browsing information to Personal Information you may submit to DBER.xyz or its agents; browsing information is for internal purposes such as understanding how the site it used and how to improve the site, and for system administration.

title: Terms of Use
text:
Disclaimers

DBER.xyz is provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis for general information and educational purposes only; content should not be taken as professional advice.
DBER.xyz makes no representations or warranties of any kind, expressed or implied, as to th eoperation of the site or the information, content, materials, or products on DBER.xyz. To the full extent permissable by applicable law, DBER.xyz disclaims all warranties, expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.
DBER.xyz or its agents are not liable for damages of any kind arising from the use of this site, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, or consequential damages.
DBER.xyz contains links to external sites that are not under our authorship or control. Users are directed to consult all applicable Terms, Policies, Disclaimers, etc. of all third party websites.
You understand that by using DBER.xyz you may be exposed to content that you may find offensive or objectionable and that, in this respect, you use DBER.xyz at your own risk. If you feel you might be offended by the content of DBER.xyz, you should not continue.
